scripts.buildNOTYET: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js -f umd --amd.id d3-series-stats -n d3_svg -o build/d3-series-stats.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-series-stats.js -c -m -o build/d3-series-stats.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-series-stats.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-series-stats.js build/d3-series-stats.min.js
